scripts.dev:db: dotenv -- terraform apply -auto-approve -var-file env.development.tfvars -var enable_ec2=true -var create_database=true
scripts.start:db: dotenv -- terraform apply -auto-approve -var-file env.production.tfvars -var enable_ec2=true -var create_database=true
scripts.logs: ssh -i ~/.ssh/id_ed25519 -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no ubuntu@$(terraform output -raw dev_ip) 'sudo cat /var/log/cloud-init-output.log'
scripts.status: ssh -i ~/.ssh/id_ed25519 -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no ubuntu@$(terraform output -raw dev_ip) 'cloud-init status --long'
scripts.docker: ssh -i ~/.ssh/id_ed25519 -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no ubuntu@$(terraform output -raw dev_ip) 'docker ps -a'
scripts.nginx: ssh -i ~/.ssh/id_ed25519 -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no ubuntu@$(terraform output -raw dev_ip) 'sudo systemctl status nginx --no-pager'
